name: Beastformer
description:
A and D - Left and Right

W - Jump

Space - Change forms

Animal Forms :

  • Lion - Can run and jump
  • Bird - Can fly up and down
  • Armadillo - Can roll through small spaces and go up gray walls.

This game is extremely rough and rushed but hey, at least I made a complete product and it's somewhat decent of an experience despite how short it is.

Music by : ZStriefel

Art by : TheCatLady

Extra Art:
